title: Number of outbound trips from China to Europe in 2018 , by region of destination
summary: This bar chart has 4 categories for the x axis representing Europe European Union, and a y axis representing Arrivals in millions.
The highest category is found at Central/Eastern_Europe where Arrivals in millions is 5.93.
The lowest category is found at Southern/Mediterranean_Europe where Arrivals in millions is 1.12.
